member.name: F:Codecool.CodeCoolersEverywhere.DbGenerator.DbGenerator.CODECOOLERNUM
member.summary: CODECOOLERNUM can be limited in case of performance issues. In case you still run in performance problems you can limit the number of schools per Codecooler, reducing the size of switch table.
